column5: Hey everyone , any one have one ? or heard anything on them ? i personaly just baught the new Curado 200 E7 and love it , but was wondering if anyone had any feed back on the Citica E ? is it worth the money  ?  or should i just save a couple more dollars for another curado E
http://www.bassresource.com/bass_fishing_f...?num=1234556304  I don`t own one, my reel buying days are over. I wouldn`t hesitate to by one if I needed another bait caster for all around fishing.

I have a couple of Citica 200E reels and although I have only been using them for a few weeks now for soft water PIKE, I can honestly say I love them. They are awsome, cast a mile, super smooth drag system. The low profile is great to, fits into your hand like a glove when retreiving. I have them paired up with Crucial Rods and I can't wait to use them for bass, walleye, etc. I think they are worth every penny.  Dirk

I had a Citica for my first decent baitcaster.  It was awesome, great reel.  I have since upgraded (Damn you Jose!!!!, lol)  But the Citica is the current backup and I don't plan on replacing it anytime soon.
The new Citica has been very impressive so far.  I have spoken to many people who have purchased it and/or used it and they have all been positive responses.  Great choice.
I bought 2 last year on sale and wish I had bought them all!  Been very happy with mine and they were used quite heavily last season.
I used my buddies last year and was very impressed.It was smoother than the more exspensive one I bought.
Oh yea blame in on me BTW I have another one  Jose
